beliefs.claim: Bilal uses and researches multiple assessment frameworks for Bloom: PERMAH (wellbeing), Universal Skills, Habits of Mind, Skills Builder, PERMA at Work - comparing and integrating them
beliefs.reasoning: Entire conversation (messages 1-14) is researching these frameworks. Asks ChatGPT about PERMAH, Universal Skills assessment methods, Habits of Mind, Skills Builder, creates comparison tables, maps Scaling module to Universal Skills. Building integrated assessment approach.

beliefs.reasoning: Clear pattern: Messages 1-14 coherent Bloom research. Message 15: 'is it possible i kileed my mycelium by putting them in a jar with no airholes?' Complete context switch. Message 17: Mac scanning. Classic hyperfocus â†’ random pivot. Connects to Conv 5, 7 ADHD patterns.

values_cards.title: Integrating Multiple Assessment Frameworks
attention_policies: FRAMEWORKS that measure different dimensions of growth (wellbeing, skills, mindsets)
COMPARISONS between similar frameworks (Skills Builder vs Habits of Mind) to find best fit
METHODS that balance fairness (automated) with nuance (human-assessed)
WAYS to make assessment scalable (digital) without losing quality
MAPPINGS between activities and skills - intentional development not accidental

quotes: what do you know about PERMAH?
can you share a table that compares the skills in skills builder and habits of mind
can you make an table of all universal skills and then two columns, human assessed and digitally assessed
please pick 1 to 3 different categories from the universal skills framework that you think might be developed along side
stories: Researching PERMAH, Universal Skills, Habits of Mind, Skills Builder, PERMA at Work
Designing system with both digital and human assessment
Mapping Scaling module to specific universal skills categories

values_cards.title: Attention Pivots Driven by Curiosity
attention_policies: QUESTIONS that capture attention completely (PERMAH frameworks, mushroom cultivation)
MOMENTS when new curiosity interrupts current focus
INTERESTS that span business, science, technology, nature without clear connection
FREEDOM to follow tangents even mid-conversation
ACCEPTANCE of scattered attention as part of how mind works

quotes: Hi, what do you know about PERMAH?
is it possible i kileed my mycelium by putting them in a jar with no airholes?
how to scan on mac wirelessly with xp435
stories: 14 messages on Bloom frameworks, suddenly asks about mycelium survival
Jumps from mushroom cultivation to Mac scanning with no transition
Pattern of hyperfocus then random pivot (seen in Conv 5, 7)

book_material.claim: Integrating multiple assessment frameworks (PERMAH, Universal Skills, Habits of Mind, Skills Builder) for comprehensive growth measurement
book_material.why_book_worthy: Shows how Bilal builds Bloom methodology by comparing/integrating frameworks. Not inventing from scratch but synthesizing best of existing approaches. Book G (Portfolio) - methodology chapter.

book_material.claim: Designing assessment with both digital (automated, fair, scalable) and human (nuanced, contextual) components
book_material.why_book_worthy: Practical approach to scaling assessment without losing quality. Balance between automation and human touch. Book G or E (AI for Social Good) - how to use technology for assessment.

book_material.claim: Mapping every training activity to 1-3 specific skills - intentional development through business activities (e.g., Scaling module â†’ strategy, teamwork)
book_material.why_book_worthy: Curriculum design philosophy: every activity serves skill development. Not just 'learn about scaling' but 'develop problem-solving + leadership THROUGH scaling.' Book G methodology.

book_material.claim: ADHD attention pattern visible: 14 focused messages on frameworks â†’ sudden pivot to mushroom cultivation â†’ random tech question
book_material.why_book_worthy: SHOWS (not tells) ADHD pattern. Hyperfocus then random pivot. Connects to Conv 5 (hyperfocus till 12:30am), Conv 7 (gets lost on questions). Book A (Integrated Approach) - working WITH neurodivergence.

analysis_notes.context: February 27, 2023 - BEFORE March crisis month (Conv 5, 6, 7) and Nur Coop/Audit work (Conv 8, 9). Bilal researching assessment frameworks for Bloom. Starts focused on PERMAH, Universal Skills, Habits of Mind, Skills Builder frameworks - comparing, creating tables, designing digital+human assessment system. Then suddenly pivots to mushroom cultivation (mycelium in jar), then Mac scanning. Classic ADHD pattern.
analysis_notes.key_insight: This shows Bilal BUILDING Bloom methodology by researching and integrating existing frameworks (PERMAH, Universal Skills, etc). Not creating from scratch but synthesizing. Focus on making assessment both scalable (digital, automated, fair) AND nuanced (human-assessed where needed). Mapping activities to skills shows intentional curriculum design. The mushroom cultivation pivot is classic ADHD - hyperfocus on frameworks interrupted by random curiosity about mycelium. Validates pattern from Conv 5 (hyperfocusing till 12:30am), Conv 7 (gets lost on questions that capture him).
analysis_notes.cross_conversation_patterns: Conv 6 (March 21): Using Universal Skills + VIA + ECAT to analyze self. THIS (Feb 27): Researching Universal Skills framework origins. Conv 7 (March 21): PERMA scores (Meaning 4.89, Relationships 3.44). THIS: Researching PERMAH framework. Conv 3 (Jan 2025): Bloom methodology deployed. THIS (Feb 2023): Bloom methodology being BUILT by comparing frameworks. ADHD pattern: Conv 5 (hyperfocus till 12:30am, gets lost on questions), Conv 7 (nerdy, gets lost on questions), THIS: hyperfocus on frameworks then random pivot to mushrooms. CONSISTENT PATTERN.
questions_for_later_convos: Did Bilal choose one framework or continue integrating multiple?
Is digital+human assessment implemented in Bloom platform?
Are activities still mapped to specific skills in later programs?
Does mushroom cultivation show up again? Just random interest or ongoing hobby?
Which frameworks ended up in final Bloom methodology?
PERMAH vs PERMA - did Bloom use the H (Hope) version?
analysis_notes.connection_to_previous: Timeline: Feb 27 (THIS, framework research) â†’ March 1 (Conv 5, emotional exploration) â†’ March 21 (Conv 6&7, self-analysis using frameworks) â†’ March 22 (Conv 8&9, Nur Coop + Bloom audit). The frameworks researched HERE (PERMAH, Universal Skills) are USED in Conv 6&7 for self-analysis. Shows: research â†’ apply to self â†’ use with clients. ADHD pattern confirmed across: Conv 5 (12:30am hyperfocus), Conv 6 (nerdy, gets lost), Conv 7 (motor mouth, can't stop), THIS (mushroom pivot).
analysis_notes.timeline_marker: February 27, 2023 - Before March crisis month, researching Bloom assessment frameworks
analysis_notes.adhd_note: Messages 1-14: Focused framework research. Message 15: Mushroom cultivation. Message 17: Mac scanning. NO TRANSITION. Classic ADHD attention switching.
